response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. This unique offering is priced at $950,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and the benefits it promises. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your investment. Should you choose to accept this offer, we will ensure a seamless transaction process, tailored to your convenience. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
